desc: Experience the best vinyl record store at Morrow Records. Free shipping available.

layout.text:
MORROW RECORDS / 6608 DIXIE HIGHWAY / FLORENCE KY 41042
Call 859-918-1236
STORE & OFFICE HOURS:
MONDAY THROUGH THURSDAY - 11:00am to 7:00pm EST
FRIDAY AND SATURDAY - 11:00am to 8:00pm EST
SUNDAY - Noon to 6:00pm EST
